title: blank squares in the death recap
body: in the recap where it lists the abilities that contributed to my death, sometimes there are blank squares. whats up with that?

replies.body:
Veigar Ult, obviously :P

Honestly, I think it's probably just a bug. Try uninstalling/reinstalling or use the "Fix" button in Client settings.

nah the death recap is bugged for certain things for everyone, things like reworked or new item passives and actives or damage from redbuff will leave the blank spots. Reinstalling will not fix this, I tried.
